column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Thursday released the minutes of its discount         rate meetings from May 19 to June 25, 2003.The minutes are attached.Attachment (93 KB PDF)2003 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: August 21, 2003
